Event: Feeling depressed and unnatural in wanting to be depressed and stuck in a comfort zone of depression, with a rejection of help from professionals and a desire to ultimately kill oneself.

I just feel like I'll never be able to escape this dark cloud that's been following me around for so long. Sometimes, I even find myself wishing I could just disappear forever."

It is important to note that the attribution style in this post is unstable because it attributes the cause of depression to external factors such as rejection from professionals and a desire to kill oneself. In contrast, a stable attributional style would attribute the cause of depression to internal factors such as personal shortcomings or flaws.

This post exhibits a stable attributional style because it attributes the individual's current mental health issues and feelings of hopelessness to their own inherent flaws or shortcomings, rather than to external circumstances or temporary factors.
